examples.korean: Bassanio (Joseph Fiennes) is a young aristocrat in love, but he wasted his money and is too poor to marry the woman of his dreams, Portia (Lynn Collins). 듣기 Add to Wordbook 베사니오(조셉 파인즈)는 사랑에 빠진 귀족 청년이다. 그러나 그는 돈을 다 써버려서 그가 꿈에 그리던 여인, 포시아(린 콜린스)와 결혼하기에 역부족이다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Bassanio (Joseph Fiennes) is a young aristocrat in love, but he wasted his money and is too poor to marry the woman of his dreams, Portia (Lynn Collins). Add to Wordbook
